text.div:
STEC Infection (Tests for STEC, E. coli O157 H7, or E. coli O157 by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    10851-4 Escherichia coli O157:H7 [Presence] in Stool by Organism specific culture
    16835-1 Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    16836-9 Escherichia coli verotoxic identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    44089-1 Escherichia coli O157:H7 [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    44090-9 Escherichia coli O157:H7 [Presence] in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    45162-5 Escherichia coli O157 Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Latex agglutination
    53955-1 Escherichia coli O157 identified in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    82303-9 Escherichia coli O157 [Presence] in Stool by Culture
    87376-0 Escherichia coli Stx1 toxin stx1 gene [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    87377-8 Escherichia coli Stx2 toxin stx2 gene [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    87380-2 Escherichia coli Stx2e toxin stx2e gene [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
